question: Last month you had an overseas holiday with some friends where you stayed at their house. They have just sent you some holiday photos. Write a letter to your friends. In your letter:● Thank them for the holiday and the photos.● Explain why you didn’t write earlier.● Invite them to come and stay with you.
text: Hope you and your family are doing well.I am writing to let you know that I received our lovely photographs.I can not thank you enough for your hosting during our visit, We all had a really great moment together and the best part about it is, the conversations that we had in your garden which has beautiful flowers.

As soon as I came back from the trip,I got busy with my routine work as I took a long vacation I had a  bunch of tasks that were waiting for me in my office.So, I did not get a chance to connect with you since then. I am really sorry for the late response.All the memories that we gathered at your place none of us can forget in our lives.

Next time,I want you to plan a visit to my place in India for the Diwali festival.I really want to take that opportunity to host you and give you an amazing experience with us.It will be a get-together for our families as well.
